name: VNTargetedImageRequest
desc: The abstract superclass for image analysis requests that operate on both the processed image and a secondary image.

items.name: init(targetedCGImage: CGImage, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting a Core Graphics image, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedCGImage: CGImage, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting a Core Graphics image of known orientation, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedCIImage: CIImage, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting a CIImage, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedCIImage: CIImage, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting a CIImage of known orientation, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedCVPixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting an image in a CVPixelBuffer, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedCVPixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting an image in a CVPixelBuffer of known orientation, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedCMSampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request with a completion handler that targets an image in a sample buffer.

items.name: init(targetedCMSampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request with a completion handler that targets an image of a known orientation in a sample buffer.

items.name: init(targetedImageData: Data, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting an image as raw data, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedImageData: Data, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting a raw data image of known orientation, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedImageURL: URL, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting an image at the specified URL, executing the completion handler when done.

items.name: init(targetedImageURL: URL, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any], completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new request targeting an image of known orientation, at the specified URL, executing the completion handler when done.
